name: sqlite-worker
description: A simple, and persistent, SQLite database for Web and Workers

scripts.build: npm run import && npm run cjs && npm run rollup:es && npm run rollup:init && npm run rollup:sw && npm run rollup:worker
scripts.cjs: ascjs --no-default esm cjs && npm run cjs:fix
scripts.rollup:init: rollup --config rollup/init.config.js && sed -i 's/const dist = .*/const dist = ".";/' dist/tmp.js && terser dist/tmp.js --module -c -m -o dist/init.js && rm dist/tmp.js
scripts.rollup:sw: rollup --config rollup/sw.config.js && sed -i 's/exports.init =/return/; s/var sqliteWorker =/self.sqliteWorker =/' dist/tmp.js && terser dist/tmp.js -c -m -o dist/sw.js && rm dist/tmp.js
scripts.rollup:worker: rollup --config rollup/worker.config.js && sed -i 's/const dist = .*//' dist/tmp.js && terser dist/tmp.js -c -m -o dist/worker.js && rm dist/tmp.js

author: Andrea Giammarchi
